biotools.summary: It provides a set of functions to create basic visualizations to quickly preview different aspects of biodiversity information such as inventory completeness, extent of coverage (taxonomic, temporal and geographic), gaps and biases.

bioschemas.name: bdvis
bioschemas.summary: It provides a set of functions to create basic visualizations to quickly preview different aspects of biodiversity information such as inventory completeness, extent of coverage (taxonomic, temporal and geographic), gaps and biases.
